mapper.sql: a.year AS "year", a.quarter AS "quarter", a.SV AS "sv", -- 合同金额 a.K_SV AS "kSv", -- 收款金额 a.K_COG AS "kCog", -- 采购成本 a.stock_in_amount AS "stockInAmount", -- 库存金额,按比率 a.customer_cost AS "customerCost", -- 销售奖金(按比率) a.discount AS "discount", -- 额外费用(按比率) a.returning_amount AS "returningAmount", -- 退货成本(按比率) a.EXTRA_AMOUNT as "extraAmount", a.k_gp AS "kGp", a.k_np AS "kNp", a.k_tr_v AS "kTrV", a.k_pcc_v AS "kPccV", a.k_yj_v AS "kYjV", a.k_ew_v AS "kEwV", a.k_sc AS "kSc", a.k_lc AS "kLc", a.payment_schedule as "paymentSchedule", a2.id AS "contract.id", a2.no AS "contract.no", a2.name AS "contract.name", a3.sort AS "finance.sort", a4.id AS "saler.id", a4.name AS "saler.name", a.status AS "status"
LEFT JOIN oa_contract a2 ON a2.id = a.contract_id LEFT JOIN oa_contract_finance a3 ON a3.id = a.payment_id LEFT JOIN sys_user a4 ON a4.id = a.k_saler_id
